summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from September 2021 between individuals, including a Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office, attempting to schedule a call regarding the Epstein case. It shows ongoing investigative activity years after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, DOJ Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: A Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office is attempting to schedule a call regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the Special Agent wants to include in a call regarding the Epstein case.

connections.description: The Special Agent indicates they wish to speak with an unnamed recipient alongside SSA, suggesting a professional working relationship.

events.title: Initial Call Request Regarding Epstein Case
events.description: A Special Agent from the DOJ OIG requests a call to discuss the Epstein case with an unnamed recipient and SSA.

events.title: Follow-up Attempts to Schedule Call
events.description: Multiple email exchanges occur on September 20, 2021, as the Special Agent attempts to schedule a call regarding the Epstein case.

locations: New York Field Office, U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General was actively investigating the Epstein case as of September 2021.
Communication shows attempts to schedule a call involving a Special Agent and a Supervisory Special Agent (SSA).
The document indicates ongoing official interest and investigative activity related to Epstein years after his death.
The correspondence originates from the New York Field Office of the DOJ OIG.
